subject: Volleyball
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: The volleyball player Stacy Sykora is recovering after an April bus accident in Brazil, which has cast doubt on whether she will be able to compete at the 2012 London Olympics.
snippet: The volleyball player Stacy Sykora is recovering after an April bus accident in Brazil, which has cast doubt on whether she will be able to compete at the 2012 London Olympics.
